Name: The naming of the Paul A. Vallone Animal Shelter and Care Center
Title: A Local Law in relation to the naming of the Paul A. Vallone Animal Shelter and Care Center

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Health

Summary: This bill would designate the Queens Animal Shelter and Care Center as the Paul A. Vallone Animal Shelter and Care Center.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      
      
      Section 1. The following facility in the borough of Queens, as required to be established pursuant to local law number 123 for the year 2018, is hereby designated as hereafter indicated. 
New Name
Present Name
Paul A. Vallone Animal Shelter and Care Center
Queens Animal Shelter and Care Center
      ï¿½ 2. This local law takes effect immediately.
